detailsSection:
These documents aim to provide a 360-degree view of the best solutions from Microsoft for building Cloud Native Apps that run anywhere.
  • The e-book Build Cloud-Native Applications Anywhere, at scaleexplains the new trends sustaining the cloud-native approach, and the various technologies to deliver cloud-native apps anywhere and at scale.
  • The guide How to deliver Cloud-Native Applications that run anywhere explains how to:
  • Use familiar tools like Visual Studio Code to create reusable environments for developers with containers, and leverage building blocks to fasten Cloud Native apps development with Dapr.
  • Spin up a development environment with a click-through GitHub Codespaces, begin the correct way with GitHub Accelerators through baseline and pre-configured architecture, deliver your code with GitHub Actions, and automate the infrastructure creation with Bicep.
  • Deploy Azure Application services on any CNCF-compatible Kubernetes cluster and manage your apps anywhere with Azure Arc.
